Home > Asia > India > Maharashtra > Mumbai (Bombay) > Mumbai (Bombay) Restaurants > Swati Snacks
Back to Swati Snacks Swati Snacks: Restaurant Reviews 248, Karai Estate, Tardeo Road | Opposite Bhatia Hospital , Mumbai (Bombay) 400036 , India 022 66808405 Website Got a photo? Add it. Ranked #34 of 773 restaurants in Mumbai (Bombay) 77 Reviews Price range: $5 - $10 Good for: Families with children Dining options: Breakfast/Brunch, Lunch, Delivery Restaurant details Good for: Families with children Dining options: Breakfast/Brunch, Lunch, Delivery Update restaurant details Write a Review 77 reviews from our community 80% Recommend Excellent 35 Very good 27 Average 13 Poor 2 Terrible 0 Rating summary Food Service Value Atmosphere 77 reviews sorted by Date Rating payalp18 Dallas, Texas 1 review 2 helpful votes “Best Fast Food restaurant for traditional Gujarati, North&South Indian Snacks” Reviewed November 18, 2008 2 people found this review helpful Everytime I vist India I have to visit Swati atleast 4-5 times. The food is outstanding. Some of the dishes I enjoy are Thalipith with Gatta Nu Shak, Dhanshak (tradional Parsi dish), Fadda Ni Kicchdi (Tradional Gujarati Rice Dish), Panki (South Indian Dish) and Falafel. The portions are small so order atleast 2-3 dishes per person. I finish off with Sitafal Icecream or Malai Malupua for dessert. If you like snow cones or Baraf Gola's it is totally safe as they make it from bottled water.
The only downfall you have to wait about 30-40 minutes at any time of the day because it is an extremly poular restaurants. Forget going there on Sunday's cause you will wait a minimum of 60 minutes.
The food is totally wait the worth. I always wish I can take some back home. Was this review helpful? Yes Problem with this review? Ask payalp18 about Swati Snacks This review is the subjective opinion of a TripAdvisor member and not of TripAdvisor LLC.
